blockEntries.name: schema-config-file
blockEntries.desc: The path to the schema config file. The schema config is used only when running Cortex with the chunks storage.

blockEntries.name: ingester-chunk-encoding
blockEntries.desc: Encoding version to use for chunks.

blockEntries.name: querier-query-parallelism
blockEntries.desc: Max subqueries run in parallel per higher-level query.
